title: Fireside with the Underboss - "Roy Demeo's Crew Came in with Saws Took Him Out in Little Pieces"
description: By telling Paul Castellano that he looked like a chicken, Paul's daughter's boyfriend signs his death certificate. He not only insulted his looks, but compared him to one of his least favorite businessmen, Frank Purdue.
itunes:author: Sammy "The Bull" Gravano
itunes:subtitle: By telling Paul Castellano that he looked like a chicken, Paul's daughter's boyfriend signs his death certificate. He not only insulted his looks, but compared him to one of his least favorite businessmen, Frank Purdue.
